name: Sample Item
description: This is a sample structure of an item. This must not be loaded into the database.

name: Wood
description: A basic material needed for every uses.

name: Stick
description: A small stick. Can be used to craft all sort of tools.

name: Wood Pickaxe
description: A fragile pickaxe. It can only mine a small amount of things before breaking apart.

name: Rotten Flesh
description: A disgusting drop from killing zombies. This can be used to brew potions.

name: Spider Eye
description: A drop from killing spiders. This can be used to brew potions.

name: Gunpowder
description: A drop from killing creepers. This can be used to brew potions.

name: Stone
description: A hard material. Can be used to make somewhat good tools.

name: Stone Pickaxe
description: A somewhat reliable pickaxe. It can mine slightly more stuff.

name: Stone Sword
description: A somewhat reliable sword. Don't expect it to kill many stuff.

name: Iron
description: A fairly modern material. It can be used to craft pretty good tools.
